thread.title: "Misha is better than anything I could ever ask for": Shahid Kapoor
thread.title_full: "Misha is better than anything I could ever ask for": Shahid Kapoor

author: Bolly-Freak
title: "Misha is better than anything I could ever ask for": Shahid Kapoor
text:
January 24, 2017 Bolly-Freak 1938 reads 0 comments 
Shahid Kapoor had taken to Twitter to announce the birth of his little princess, not so long ago. "She is here", the proud dad had announced. Today, Shahid wrote more about his daughter on his social networking handle. 
He wrote, "Misha is better than anything I could ever ask for. Every girl is truly a blessing to the entire family. Happy #NationalGirlChildDay all." 
Isn't that adorable? 
Shahid and Mira tied the knot last year. They recently appeared on the chat show Koffee with Karan and their crackling chemistry was for all to see.
